title._content: Image taken from page 284 of 'Virginia Illustrated: containing A Visit to the Virginian Canaan, and The Adventures of Porte Crayon and his Cousins. Illustrated from drawings by Porte Crayon'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Virginia Illustrated: containing A Visit to the Virginian Canaan, and The Adventures of Porte Crayon and his Cousins. Illustrated from drawings by Porte Crayon", "Appendix" Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010410.ee.28." Page: 284 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1857 Publisher: Harper & Bros. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003803560 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Please note that you will need to enter details from the above list - such as the shelfmark, the page, the book's volume and so on - when filling out your order. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue. You will be able to download a PDF of the book this image is taken from, as well as view the pages up close with the 'itemViewer'. Click on the 'related items' to search for the electronic version of this work.
